name: Coinbet Finance
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
Coinbet is a decentralized Web 3.0 betting protocol, founded with the mission to enable users to earn yield through bankrolling betting activities, as well as to empower players to gamble on a provably fair blockchain betting protocol.

Through blockchain technology, Coinbet Finance aims to democratize the way online betting works for both sides - The Players and The House.

CFI is Coinbet’s Governance Token that is used for:

* Voting on governance proposals through Coinbet’s DAO
* Waiving fees when playing betting games or providing liquidity

Coinbet Finance products include: 

* Decentralized Web3 betting games
* Staking (House) Pools for bankrolling betting activities and earning a share from the rewards
